div.p: Indicates the potential degree of impact of the identified issue on the patient.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/detectedissue-severity defines the following codes:

tr.td: Indicates the issue may be life-threatening or has the potential to cause permanent injury.
Indicates the issue may result in noticeable adverse consequences but is unlikely to be life-threatening or cause permanent injury.
Indicates the issue may result in some adverse consequences but is unlikely to substantially affect the situation of the subject.

description.value: Indicates the potential degree of impact of the identified issue on the patient.

definition.value: Indicates the issue may be life-threatening or has the potential to cause permanent injury.
Indicates the issue may result in noticeable adverse consequences but is unlikely to be life-threatening or cause permanent injury.
Indicates the issue may result in some adverse consequences but is unlikely to substantially affect the situation of the subject.
